parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of domain names to query. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The value of StartTime must be in UTC. For example, if the local time is 00:00 on June 1, 2021, set StartTime to 2021-05-31T16:00:00Z.
